author: Lucas Nolan, Lucas Nolan
title: Google Twitter Ban Ads that Mention Coronavirus
description: Tech giants Google and Twitter are reportedly banning any ads that include the mention of "coronavirus" or "COVID-19" from their platforms. The ban extends to everyone on the platforms except for selected official sources.
content:
Tech giants Google and Twitter are reportedly banning any ads that include the mention of “coronavirus” or “COVID-19” from their platforms. The ban extends to everyone on the platforms except for selected official sources.
The Washington Examinerreports that… [+2857 chars]
